SEARCH
Package jpacman.controller

Class Pacman

java.lang.Object
jpacman.controller.Pacman
public class Pacman extends Object
Top level Pacman class. The main method creates the engine, the GUI, and the controllers; the methods of the Pacman object created get invoked by the GUI and the controllers.
Version:
$Id: Pacman.java,v 1.6 2008/02/03 19:43:38 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Aug 31, 2003

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Pacman()
    Create a default new game, containing an egnine, a gui, and a monster driver.
    Pacman(Engine e)
    Create a new game around a given engine, using the default random monster mover.
    Pacman(Engine e, IMonsterController m)
    Create a new game from a given engine and monster mover.

    • Pacman

      public Pacman() throws IOException
      Create a default new game, containing an egnine, a gui, and a monster driver.
      Throws:
      IOException - If underlying figures can't be found.

    • Pacman

      public Pacman(Engine e) throws IOException
      Create a new game around a given engine, using the default random monster mover.
      Parameters:
      e - The Engine to be used.
      Throws:
      IOException - If animations can't be found.

    • Pacman

      public Pacman(Engine e, IMonsterController m) throws IOException
      Create a new game from a given engine and monster mover.
      Parameters:
      e - The Engine to be used, not null.
      m - The monster mover to be used, not null.
      Throws:
      IOException - If images can't be found.
